title: replays
body: when we download them is their a way to keep them?

replies.body:
There's also built in recording functionality so you can record highlights too =D (I haven't tried recording a whole replay with the built in tool though)

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/client/client-features/road-pre-season-replays-horizon

Unfortunately not directly within the client. You can use recording software like OBS to record the replay to a video file, but as I mentioned earlier, there is no way to open a replay for an older patch once a new patch rolls.
